summary: Both previously identified arithmetic guard issues were fixed correctly with no new blocking problems introduced.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: divideWithFloor was not a true floor for negative values due to BigInt truncation toward zero
previous_issues_status.notes: Function now adjusts quotient when remainder exists and operands have opposite signs, producing true floor.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: subtractMicroUSD allowed negative operands which could bypass MAX_MICRO_USD guards
previous_issues_status.notes: Function now rejects negative operands before subtraction, preventing invariant bypass.
